pages.text: Increases spell damage by 35% and adds 0.5 flat damage. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_lethality)Path of Lethality$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter hungers with bloodlust. $(o)it can now deal damage like a sword.$() Manifests if you complete the Dangerous Path of Lethality.
